cards.name: AxeRaider
cards.description: An axe-wielding monster of tremendous strength and agility.

cards.name: Fireyarou
cards.description: A malevolent creature wrapped in flames that attacks enemies with intense fire.

cards.name: HornImp
cards.description:
A small fiend that dwells in the dark,
	 its single horn makes it a formidable opponent.

cards.name: SilverFang
cards.description:
A snow wolf that's beautiful to the eye,
	 but absolutely vicious in battle.
